experience.title: Project manager
experience.description: Managed client outreach projects targeting American, Canadian, and Scandinavian e-commerce businesses, overseeing the process from initial contact to closing deals.Handled e-commerce-related ad hoc tasks, including website audits, report creation, leading weekly meetings, developing ad creatives, and managing Google and Meta ad campaigns.
experience.description_html: Managed client outreach projects targeting American, Canadian, and Scandinavian e-commerce businesses, overseeing the process from initial contact to closing deals.Handled e-commerce-related ad hoc tasks, including website audits, report creation, leading weekly meetings, developing ad creatives, and managing Google and Meta ad campaigns. <!---->

experience.title: Business Development Intern
experience.description: Gained experience in the low-code software industry.Participated in account management projects.Engaged in market research to identify growth opportunities.Contributed to the development of a new Order-to-Cash AI product by conducting market research and assisting in algorithm testing.
experience.description_html: Gained experience in the low-code software industry.Participated in account management projects.Engaged in market research to identify growth opportunities.Contributed to the development of a new Order-to-Cash AI product by conducting market research and assisting in algorithm testing. <!---->

experience.title: Country Marketing Manager
experience.description: Played a pivotal role in the localization and introduction of a stock trading app to the Hungarian market.Localized marketing copies and high-performing ad creatives, resulting in a 2.2% average Click-Through Rate.Led the 'Investacademy' project, an educational article series designed for both new and existing users.Result: 40% increase in customer retention rates.Conducted in-depth customer development interviews.Worked closely with the product development team.Played a pivotal role in customer support operations, including managing one employee and creating customer service scripts to improve response consistency and service quality.
experience.description_html: Played a pivotal role in the localization and introduction of a stock trading app to the Hungarian market.Localized marketing copies and high-performing ad creatives, resulting in a 2.2% average Click-Through Rate.Led the 'Investacademy' project, an educational article series designed for both new and existing users.Result: 40% increase in customer retention rates.Conducted in-depth customer development interviews.Worked closely with the product development team.Played a pivotal role in customer support operations, including managing one employee and creating customer service scripts to improve response consistency and service quality.

experience.title: Sales And Marketing Assistant
experience.description: Managed a variety of sales and marketing responsibilities. Primary clients included American cash buyer companies, real estate agencies, realtors, and individual real estate agents.
experience.description_html: Managed a variety of sales and marketing responsibilities. Primary clients included American cash buyer companies, real estate agencies, realtors, and individual real estate agents. <!---->

experience.title: B2B Operations Assistant
experience.description: Supported the CEO of the largest Hungarian candle and tea light wholesaler in his daily activities.Maintained contact and held occasional face-to-face meetings with manufacturing facilities in Poland and the company's subsidiary, Prometeo Candela SRL, in Romania.Represented the company at trade shows and contributed to extending the product portfolio.
experience.description_html: Supported the CEO of the largest Hungarian candle and tea light wholesaler in his daily activities.Maintained contact and held occasional face-to-face meetings with manufacturing facilities in Poland and the company's subsidiary, Prometeo Candela SRL, in Romania.Represented the company at trade shows and contributed to extending the product portfolio. <!---->

experience.title: Sales Team Member
experience.description: Student organization work in sales specialization.   Managed CRM system to track sponsor outreach and maintain long-term partnerships.
